name: EnterovirusInfectionNonPolioTestsForNonPolioEnterovirusInCerebrospinalFluidNucleicAcid
title: Enterovirus Infection [Non polio] (Tests for Non Polio Enterovirus in Cerebrospinal Fluid Nucleic Acid)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with detecting the presence of Non Polio Enterovirus in CSF by NAA),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: Non Polio Enterovirus in CSF by NAA),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
